name: acquiescently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are willing to do what someone has asked you to do: They continued to sit acquiescently where they had been told. "Yes, of course, ma'am, whatever you say," he replied acquiescently.
More examplesFewer examplesSuch is the culture of fear in the business that the staff follow acquiescently every order they are given, however unreasonable.She would simply nod her head acquiescently, eyes downcast, when asked to do something.Many of the older people go along acquiescently with these long-standing traditions even when they clearly cause harm.
